title: Drawing, "View of Hills and Mountain Ranges across a Valley near San Miguel de Chimbo and  Guaranda, Ecuador", June 3, 1857
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at lower center: Lugt 457 d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, across upper margin:  2 River cultivated some of the hills crowned with soft dark foliage / great scarcity of tints of green (brownish also) in patchwork, trees following / up the ravines Mountaind (lower part) much cut up - in peaks / Near San Miguel de Chimbo / a few Leagues from Guaranda / June 3rd ,  57
description: Horizontal view of hills and mountain ranges across a valley

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "View of Hills and Mountain Ranges across a Valley near San Miguel de Chimbo and  Guaranda, Ecuador", June 3, 1857.
June 3, 1857. Graphite on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-706-b.
